bug.short_desc: [compiler][null] Wrong warning "Redundant null check" inside nested try statement

long_desc.thetext:
Thanks for the precise report.
The problem results from how effects in nested structures are propagated into outer finally blocks, which was broken for try statements nested in a finally block.
I have a simple fix currently being tested.

Verified for 4.3 M6 using Build id: I20130310-2000.
Raised bug 402993 as follow up for issue reported in comment#3
